mapper.insert: insert into STOCK_RIGHT_APPLY (APPLY_ID ,STOCK_HOLDER_ID ,TRANSFEROR_CETF_HASH ,NEW_INVESTOR_NAME ,PRICE ,CPT_AMT ,NEW_INVESTOR_ACCOUNT , NEW_INVESTOR_CETF_TYPE ,NEW_INVESTOR_CETF_NO ,NEW_INVESTOR_CETF_HASH ,IS_ARCHIVED, STATUS,INSERT_TIME ,UPDATE_TIME) values (#{applyId},#{stockHolderId},#{transferorCetfHash},#{newInvestorName},#{price},#{cptAmt},#{newInvestorAccount},#{newInvestorCetfType}, #{newInvestorCetfNo},#{newInvestorCetfHash},#{isArchived},#{status},#{insertTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update STOCK_RIGHT_APPLY set APPLY_ID = #{applyId}, STOCK_HOLDER_ID = #{stockHolderId}, TRANSFEROR_CETF_HASH = #{transferorCetfHash}, NEW_INVESTOR_NAME = #{newInvestorName}, PRICE = #{price}, CPT_AMT = #{cptAmt}, NEW_INVESTOR_ACCOUNT = #{newInvestorAccount}, NEW_INVESTOR_CETF_TYPE = #{newInvestorCetfType}, NEW_INVESTOR_CETF_NO = #{newInvestorCetfNo}, NEW_INVESTOR_CETF_HASH = #{newInvestorCetfHash}, IS_ARCHIVED = #{isArchived}, STATUS = #{status}, INSERT_TIME = #{insertTime}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime} where APPLY_ID = #{applyId}
mapper.select: select from STOCK_RIGHT_APPLY order by APPLY_ID
select from STOCK_RIGHT_APPLY where STOCK_HOLDER_ID = #{stockHolderId} order by UPDATE_TIME desc
select from STOCK_RIGHT_APPLY where STATUS = #{status} order by UPDATE_TIME desc
select from STOCK_RIGHT_APPLY where STATUS like '%-处理中' order by UPDATE_TIME limit 10
